text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1907 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ; September * 4 – Edvard Grieg (64), composer and pianist. * 5 – Adolf Østbye (39), revue artist, barber, and the first Norwegian recording artist. ; December * 1 – Agathe Backer Grøndahl (59), pianist and composer. ==Births== ==See also== * 1907 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1900s in Norwegian music
title: 1907 in Norwegian music
